info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: deces.matchid.io
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: deces.matchid.io
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

GET /robots.txt HTTP/1.1
Host: deces.matchid.io
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Alt-Svc: h3=":443"; ma=86400, h3-29=":443"; ma=86400
Cache-Control: max-age=86400
Cf-Cache-Status: MISS
Cf-Ray: 72f8e4cc3ae75a4b-IAD
Content-Security-Policy: default-src https: 'self';script-src https: 'self' 'unsafe-inline';style-src https: 'self' 'unsafe-inline';font-src 'self' data:;img-src 'self' data: https://a.basemaps.cartocdn.com https://b.basemaps.cartocdn.com https://c.basemaps.cartocdn.com https://upload.wikimedia.org;
Content-Type: text/plain
Date: Sun, 24 Jul 2022 01:31:00 GMT
Etag: W/"62c935ca-22"
Expect-Ct: max-age=604800, report-uri="https://report-uri.cloudflare.com/cdn-cgi/beacon/expect-ct"
Feature-Policy: geolocation 'none';midi 'none';sync-xhr 'none';microphone 'none';camera 'none';magnetometer 'none';gyroscope 'self';accelerometer 'self';fullscreen 'self';payment 'none';
Last-Modified: Sat, 09 Jul 2022 08:01:14 GMT
Nel: {"success_fraction":0,"report_to":"cf-nel","max_age":604800}
Referrer-Policy: same-origin
Report-To: {"endpoints":[{"url":"https:\/\/a.nel.cloudflare.com\/report\/v3?s=aieQlL68odJPp7RmTcNpgkyDIZhp27srtJlejFg%2B7Wq3GKu7Y0hWxD3H%2FlbJJUpOdGMWjq6wjm9NuTw6vLKfifjnAlDgon4G4k4YKyKvY2JwFy%2FezMKPdn1F49U%2F03h449tg"}],"group":"cf-nel","max_age":604800}
Server: cloudflare
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15552000; includeSubDomains; preload
Vary: Accept-Encoding
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: *.matchid.io
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block

User-agent: AhrefsBot
Disallow: /

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 21512
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;deces.matchid.io.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 21512
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;deces.matchid.io.	IN	 NS

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
matchid.io.	3600	IN	SOA	tia.ns.cloudflare.com. dns.cloudflare.com. 2283964399 10000 2400 604800 3600

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: deces.matchid.io
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Alt-Svc: h3=":443"; ma=86400, h3-29=":443"; ma=86400 Cf-Cache-Status: DYNAMIC Cf-Ray: 72f8e4fef9295980-IAD Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 24 Jul 2022 01:31:08 GMT Expect-Ct: max-age=604800, report-uri="https://report-uri.cloudflare.com/cdn-cgi/beacon/expect-ct" Nel: {"success_fraction":0,"report_to":"cf-nel","max_age":604800} Report-To: {"endpoints":[{"url":"https:\/\/a.nel.cloudflare.com\/report\/v3?s=ZE2M%2BLrLiOj3CyjvLKk9PIdXqaeivCfsHoHxyOKr4WfxVRyExp8wee4QoXRu57Z1j1OVjXqhxIpqifEvYlte24JWv81senES%2FJmq0Vw03NHs5KsduzEeEnTlYzocQkaHgnn8"}],"group":"cf-nel","max_age":604800} Server: cloudflare Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15552000; includeSubDomains; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff 405 Not Allowed

405 Not Allowed

nginx
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: deces.matchid.io' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://deces.matchid.io/'

kurohost

forgedhallpass

Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
